### What to submit for Week 3

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "steelblue"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "steelblue"))

wk_post <- tibble(
"eCampus?" = c(unchecked, 
               checked, 
               checked,
               checked),

Description = c("Complete modules in Data Camp that address correlation and regression as well as survey development.",
               "Complete a task on analyzing an ICPSR data set.",
               "Create a draft instrument and skeleton.", 
               "Submit your Week 3 Reflections."),

Location = c("[Link](/lesson/03-lesson/#data-camp-1)", 
             "[Link](/assignment/03-exercise/#task-exploring-icpsr)",
             "[Link](/assignment/#anchorwk3)",
             "[Link](/readings/03-readings/#questions-to-reflect-on-1)")

)
```
